column1: variable,question_text,description,type,values
consent,"I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.","Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.","categorical","Yes"
prolific_id,"Please enter your Prolific ID (this is required to receive payment).","Unique Prolific participant identifier.","text","Free text"

ai_tools_frequency,"How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?","Frequency of using AI-powered or digital tools in daily life.","categorical",""
hours_online_per_day,"On average, how many hours do you spend online each day? (self-estimate)","Estimated number of hours spent online per day.","numeric","Self-estimated hours per day"

ai_decision_help_often,"I often use AI tools to help me make decisions, even for everyday choices.","Frequency of using AI tools to assist with everyday decision-making.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_decision_confidence_with_ai,"I feel more confident in my decisions when an AI tool supports my thinking.","Confidence in decisions when supported by AI tools.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_decision_reliance_when_difficult,"I tend to rely on AI tools when making decisions feels difficult.","Tendency to rely on AI tools when decision-making feels difficult.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_decision_check_before_finalising,"I prefer to check my ideas with AI before finalising an important decision.","Preference for checking ideas with AI before finalising important decisions.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_decision_clarity_when_unsure,"AI can be helpful for giving me clarity when I'm unsure what choice to make.","Perceived value of AI tools for providing clarity when uncertain about choices.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_second_guessing,"I've started second-guessing my own judgement more than I used to.","Extent to which AI use is associated with increased second-guessing of one’s own judgement.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_doubt_when_disagree,"If AI gives a different answer to mine, I sometimes wonder whether I might be mistaken.","Degree of doubt in personal judgement when AI-generated answers differ.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_check_thinking_track,"I use AI tools to check whether my thinking is on the right track.","Use of AI tools to validate or check personal thinking.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_pause_to_check,"I tend to pause before acting so I can check what an AI tool suggests.","Tendency to pause actions in order to consult AI suggestions first.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_decision_check_for_importance,"For important decisions, I feel more comfortable checking an AI tool as part of my process.","Comfort with including AI tools as part of the process for important decisions.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_change_decision_feeling,"Using AI regularly has changed the way I feel about making decisions on my own.","Perceived change in feelings about independent decision-making due to AI use.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_reflection_amount,"I think about how much AI might be influencing my decisions.","Frequency of reflecting on the extent of AI influence on decisions.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_persuasive_effect,"I feel that AI suggestions can be persuasive, even when I try to rely on my own intuition.","Perceived persuasiveness of AI suggestions relative to personal intuition.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_separate_judgement,"I need to take a moment to separate my own judgement from AI suggestions.","Need to consciously separate personal judgement from AI-generated suggestions.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_concern_over_reliance,"Even when AI is helpful, I'm aware that relying on it too much may not be ideal for me long-term.","Awareness of potential long-term downsides of over-relying on AI tools.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_independence_without_ai,"I feel more independent when I make decisions without using AI.","Perceived independence when making decisions without AI support.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_decision_thinking,"AI tools influence how I think about my decisions.","Perceived influence of AI tools on how decisions are thought about or framed.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_reflect_shaping,"I occasionally reflect on whether AI is shaping my decision-making style.","Frequency of reflecting on whether AI is shaping one’s decision-making style.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_conflict,"I feel conflicted about how much influence AI has on me.","Level of inner conflict about the degree of AI influence on oneself.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

ai_influence_strength_of_conviction,"I generally trust my own judgement, but AI tools can sometimes affect how strongly I feel about a choice.","Extent to which AI tools affect strength of conviction in personal decisions.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert agreement scale)"

open_text_ai_decision_example,"Describe a recent moment where you relied on an AI tool to help you make a decision — big or small. What made you turn to AI instead of deciding on your own?","Open-ended description of a recent decision where an AI tool was used and reasons for choosing AI support.","text","Free text"

trust_ai_to_act_in_best_interests,"How much do you trust AI systems to act in your best interests?","Level of trust that AI systems act in the participant’s best interests.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert scale)"
what_matters_most,"How clear do you feel about what matters most in your life right now?","Self-rated clarity about what matters most in life.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert scale)"

digital_life_effect_on_focus,"How much does modern digital life affect your ability to focus, decide, or think clearly?","Perceived impact of digital life on focus, decision-making, and clear thinking.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert scale)"

feelings_about_ai_in_decision_making,"How do you feel about the growing role of AI in everyday decision-making?","Overall feeling about the growing role of AI in everyday decisions.","numeric","1–7 (standard Likert scale)"
ai_values_multi,"Which values do you believe AI systems should reflect? (select up to 3)","Values participants believe AI systems should reflect (multi-select).","multi_select",""
age_group,"What is your age group?","Participant age group.","categorical",""
gender,"Which of the following best describes your gender?","Participant gender identity.","categorical",""
country,"Country of residence.","Participant country of residence.","categorical",""
education_level,"What is your highest level of education?","Highest level of education completed.","categorical",""
work_status,"Which of the following best describes your current work status?","Participant employment or occupational status.","categorical",""
emotional_wellbeing,"How would you describe your general emotional wellbeing?","Self-rated emotional wellbeing.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Very poor, 7 = Excellent)"
